ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature
des: "This frosting goes great on lemon cake, 7-upÂ® cake, or lemon cookies."
ins: Cream the butter and cream cheese together with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Add the pineapple juice and continue beating until absorbed into the mixture. Beat the confectioners' sugar into the mixture a little at a time until completely integrated.
